channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: A year later, hurricane damange lingers at Hermitage Artist Retreat
item.description: For nearly a year, the Hermitage Artist Retreat has waited on Sarasota County to make hurricane repairs at its Manasota Key campus.Hurricanes Helene and Miltonstruck last fall, leaving the nationally recognized nonprofit with damaged historic buildings and restricted programming. While Hermitage leaders say the work could be completed in weeks, county officials have indicated it may take until late 2026.

item.title: 5 exciting Sarasota restaurant openings but a sad closing
item.description: While this time of year is typically the slowest in Sarasota, September brought plenty of exciting — and, yes, sad — dining developments, withopenings, a high-profile reopening, and a notableclosure.

item.title: Manatee Schools honors LWR athletic trainer for life-saving actions
item.description: The types of injuriesSydney Suppahas dealt with during nine years as Lakewood Ranch High’s athletic trainer aren’t surprising.

item.title: Fall back time change in 2025, see when daylight saving time ends
item.description: As fall rolls inandHalloween decorationsstart popping up in yards and stores, we are just under a month away from falling back and changing our clocks to get one more hour of sleep and less daylight.

item.title: Pre-order the WSJ 2025 Wine Advent Calendar with free shipping today
item.description: Thecountdown to Christmasjust got a lot more festive. TheWSJ Wine Advent Calendar is officially back for 2025and it is already flying off virtual shelves. With 24 mini bottles of wine, each window features a spirited glassful of something delicious, from silky reds to dry whites, refreshing rosés and even award-winning Prosecco for your holiday toasts.

item.title: Prime members can get a Bissell Little Green for under $100 this week
item.description: I'd always hoped that I would eventually outgrow my "spilling phase"—the random coffee stains on all of my T-shirts, the too-old-to-be-excusable paint splotches on my carpet. But alas, even in my late twenties, it's still a staple personality trait of mine.

item.title: Your guide to the 2025 Sarasota, Manatee high school…
item.description: From preseason practices through the state championship games, theHerald-Tribunewill be covering the high school football season every step of the way.

item.title: Amazon Big Deal Days are bringing major discounts for…
item.description: If you haven't heard the news,Amazonhas officially announced the dates for its upcoming Prime Day in October (AKA:Prime Big Deal Days), and we're beyond ready to kick off the holiday shopping season with this epic sales event!

item.title: Vote for Herald-Tribune's Football Midseason Offensive…
item.description: We have reached the halfway point of the Sarasota-Manatee high school football season. As we head into the second half of the season, we made our picks for thefront runners for Offensive and Defensive Player of the Year.

item.title: Top 5 concerts this week in Sarasota, Manatee counties
item.description: It's the first full week of October, a month that'll bringa stacked events calendarto the Sarasota area, including live music. The biggest show in town this week will be an annual Circus Arts Conservatory fundraiser and electronic dance music concert, once again headlined by an internationally renowned DJ.

item.title: Vote for Herald-Tribune's 2025 Football Midseason…
item.description: We have reached the halfway point of the Sarasota-Manatee high school football season. As we head into the second half of the season, we made our picks for thefront runners for Newcomer and Coach of the Year.

item.title: Sarasota, Manatee high school football scores: Live FHSAA, SSAA updates from Week 7
item.description: We are getting deeper into the high school football season as the calendar flips to October, the final month of the regular season. FHSAA Sarasota and Manatee county schools enter Week 7 play and some SSAA teams are getting ready to play their eighth game.

item.title: Game Balls for Week 7 top Sarasota, Manatee high school football performers
item.description: Week 7 of the Sarasota and Manatee high school football season featured shootouts, a heroic effort against one of the best teams in the country and one player setting a school record.

item.title: Bradenton homicide investigation leads to arrest of man, 69
item.description: Bradenton police have arrested a 69-year-old man on Oct. 2 in connection with thestabbing death of 44-year-old Thania Fuenmayor.

item.title: What does the Federal Reserve's rate cut mean for mortgages in Florida?
item.description: The Federal Reserve’s recent quarter-point rate cut, the first since last December, comes at a time when the central bank’s independence, something I feel strongly about, faces growing scrutiny and calls for action are louder than ever. While the Fed maintains its official mandate of taming inflation, concerns about economic resilience, highlighted by weaker-than-expected employment data, ultimately tipped the balance. Markets now widely expect the Fed to deliver as many as two additional cuts before year-end.
